content: In Boston for some [work](http://whitelabeldating.com) and [hacking](http://indiewebcamp.com/2015/Cambridge) stateside. It's absolutely flipping freezing outside but so far enjoying my few days here. Already eaten my week's worth of calories so Doing It Right.
